title: Wolves vs Liverpool live stream: how to watch Premier League from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Jurgen Klopp's men are looking to make it four wins in a row
article: Back in spitting distance of league leaders Chelsea, Jurgen Klopp's Reds head to Molineux this afternoon as they look to add to their run of three consecutive wins. Read on to find out how to watch Wolves vs Liverpool online and get a Premier League live stream, no matter where you are in the world this weekend.

Fresh from their 4-1 derby win over the blue half of Merseyside, Liverpool once again look every inch a title contender, with the Reds having scored four goals in each of those three wins and have only conceded one goal during that run.

The home side have been ticking along nicely of late, but Bruno Lage’s side showed against Burnley on Wednesday night that they do still perhaps lack a little bit of a cutting edge. They struggled to break the Clarets down, despite having all of the play.

Wolves will nevertheless be boosted by the return of key midfielder Ruben Neves from suspension and winger Daniel Podence from Covid-19 isolation, and will likely provide a tougher challenge for Liverpool than Everton did in midweek.
Follow our guide to get a Wolves vs Liverpool live stream and watch the Premier League online from anywhere today.

If you're abroad right now and struggling to tap into your local coverage of the game, you'll want a VPN. This'll help you circumvent the geo-blocking that will try to stop you watching a Wolves vs Liverpool live stream in particular parts of the world.
They're a useful means of getting around this issue, are cheap, and easy to set-up as well. Here's how it's done.
